# fgeo.build

Help developers to build the source version of __fgeo__ packages.

## Installation

You can install the released version of fgeo.build from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("forestgeo/fgeo.build")
```
